title: MC_AbortTrigger (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_AbortTrigger
This function block is designed for aborting function blocks that are connected to trigger events (e.g.
MC_TouchProbe
).

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the function block.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: TRUE: Latching has been aborted successfully.

rows:
TRUE: Execution of function block has not been finished
yet.
TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
